title: Broken MIR: generator contains type &str in MIR, but typeck only knows about {std::future::ResumeTy, impl std::future::Future, ()}

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: AsyncAwait-Triaged
labels.description: Async-await issues that have been triaged during a working group meeting.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code Using ` -Zmir-opt-level=2`: ```rust pub async fn connect() {} pub fn block_on(_: F) {} fn main() { block_on(async { Vec::::new().first().ok_or("").unwrap(); connect().await; }) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.45.0-nightly (7f65393b9 2020-05-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7f65393b9abf5e70d0b9a8080558f17c5625bd40 commit-date: 2020-05-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.45.0-nightly LLVM version: 9.0 ``` ### Error ```shell $ rustc --edition=2018 -Zmir-opt-level=2 connect.rs error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir/transform/generator.rs:722: Broken MIR: generator contains type &str in MIR, but typeck only knows about {std::future::ResumeTy, impl std::future::Future, ()} --> connect.rs:4:20 | 4 | block_on(async { | ____________________^ 5 | | Vec::::new().first().ok_or("").unwrap(); 6 | | connect().await; 7 | | }) | |_____^ ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /home/tm/test/rust/src/libstd/macros.rs:13:23 stack backtrace: 0: ::fmt 1: core::fmt::write 2: std::io::Write::write_fmt 3: std::sys_common::backtrace::print 4: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} 5: std::panicking::default_hook 6: rustc_driver::report_ice 7: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook 8: std::panicking::begin_panic 9: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::span_bug 10: rustc_errors::Handler::span_bug 11: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}} 12: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::{{closure}} 13: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 14: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 15: rustc_middle::util::bug::span_bug_fmt 16: ::run_pass 17: rustc_mir::transform::run_passes 18: rustc_mir::transform::run_optimization_passes 19: rustc_mir::transform::optimized_mir 20: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::optimized_mir>::compute 21: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 22: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 23: rustc_middle::ty::::generator_layout 24: rustc_middle::ty::layout::LayoutCx::layout_raw_uncached 25: rustc_middle::ty::layout::layout_raw 26: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::layout_raw>::compute 27: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 28: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 29: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 30: as rustc_target::abi::LayoutOf>::layout_of 31: ::run_pass 32: rustc_mir::transform::run_passes 33: rustc_mir::transform::run_optimization_passes 34: rustc_mir::transform::optimized_mir 35: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::optimized_mir>::compute 36: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 37: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 38: rustc_middle::ty::::instance_mir 39: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 40: rustc_session::utils::::time 41: rustc_mir::monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 42: rustc_mir::monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 43: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::collect_and_partition_mono_items>::compute 44: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 45: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 46: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 47: ::codegen_crate 48: rustc_session::utils::::time 49: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 50: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::enter_global 51: rustc_interface::queries::Query::compute 52: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 53: rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler_in_existing_thread_pool 54: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set 55: rustc_ast::attr::with_globals note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.45.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -Z mir-opt-level=2 query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] processing `main::{{closure}}#0` #1 [layout_raw] computing layout of `[static generator@connect.rs:4:20: 7:6 {std::future::ResumeTy, std::future::from_generator::GenFuture<[static generator@connect.rs:1:24: 1:26 {}]>, ()}]` #2 [optimized_mir] processing `main` #3 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error ``` The issue occurs with nightly, but the backtrace is from locally build `19ae74d0d`.
